It\'s so â‚¬@#!$*%, that need to search for mod packs for maybe just one part in .craft, while there are maybe dozens in the pack. Please add an extra download where the extra, parts are included in the download. (or at least add links)

It should be a .craft posting guideline to include an extra download with all the parts. I\'m sure a HUGE lot of people will like the guideline .

Thanks.
Not everyone has access to a facility to upload .zips full of mods. I just provide links to all mod packs used.
how about putting an in-game solution for psckaging .craft files thst automatically packages any non-stock part. probably not going to hsppen, but it\'d be nifty.
